title: Disassemble Landing Gear for Overhaul
description: A team of MRO technicians needs to disassemble a landing gear assembly for a major overhaul.

tasks.description: Follow the Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) to safely disassemble the landing gear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the manual's step-by-step instructions.

tasks.description: Tag each individual component with its part number and serial number for traceability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly tags all disassembled parts.

tasks.description: Route the components to their respective specialized shops (e.g., hydraulics, structures, NDT) for inspection and repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status of each component to reflect its new location in the MRO facility.
